 Set Up: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)
fitlibrary.DoFixture
start
Unknown class: HuntTheWumpus.fixtures.GameDriver		 HuntTheWumpus.fixtures.GameDriver

Import
fit
HuntTheWumpus.fixtures
At the beginning of each turn the game reports the directions that the player can go in.
Directions are listed in the order of north, south, east, west.

Expand All | Collapse All
